author: Special Correspondent
text:
Researchers working on developments in Information and Communications Technology (ICT) are invited to send papers for the International Conference on Emerging Technologies, Networking and Computational Intelligence (ICETNCI-16) to be held on March 28 in Chennai. The conference is being organised by Dhumra Mahate Information and Communication Technology Associates.

The ICETNCI series aims to provide researchers, industry experts and academics a platform to report on emerging areas in technology and their applications in boosting industrial productivity.
title: Papers invited for conference
